name: Warp Runner
description:
Warp Runner is an innovative Augmented Reality Puzzle/Platform game. Your character is trapped in the real world, help him to escape. Warp Up/Down the real world with your fingers in order to solve the puzzles and create a path through the exit. Find your way out through all the levels and regain his freedom.

Game Features:
- Tabletop Augmented Reality game: The game level appears to be in the real world.
- Motion and touch controls: Interact by moving the phone around and by touching the screen to warp the real world.
- 16 fun and challenging puzzles.
- Built with Unity3D and Qualcomm's Vuforia2.0 Augmented Reality SDK.

**Optimized for iPhone 4S, iPad 2 or newer devices.**
**slow on iPhone4 (unfortunately we cannot exclude iPhone4 from the store without excluding other devices)**
